APpropertyName.description: A metadata element name that is not a URI.

APpropertyLabel.description: A brief display label for the property. If using RDF-style language strings, only one label per language should be used

APpropertyDescription.description: A description of the property at whatever length is needed

entityLabel.description: A brief display label for the entity. If using RDF-style language strings, only one label per language should be used

entityDescription.description: A description of the entity at whatever length is needed
